ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p:
We are grateful to Dr. Manu Sharma and Professor Thomas Gasser from the University of Tubingen, Germany for providing us with the summary statistics GWAS data for selected PD cases and controls from the PD GWAS reported by Nalls et al. in 2014
62 . Furthermore, we thank Dr. Mike Nalls and the 23andMe consortium for providing access to the summary statistics from the largest GWAS of PD reported to date
69 .
